attributes.action: all agriculture vehicles off the road between 5pm friday and 5pm sun
attributes.additional_details: action would create clearer roads so folk may enjoy theis spare time
attributes.background: it beggars belief that you cannot have a stress free trip on weekends due to tractors etc clogging up the roads

rejection.details: This petition seems to be calling on operators of agricultural vehicles, not the Government or Parliament, to take action.
